23.ara-name: كتاب الجهاد عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn 'Abbas: That the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "The blessing of the horse is in its redness." [Abu 'Eisa said:] This Hadith is Hasan Gharib, we do not know of it except from this route, from the narration of Shaiban

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ مَا يُسْتَحَبُّ مِنَ الْخَيْلِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About What Is Recommend Regarding Horses
